content: my recent design of the karina turban hat is so popular already you all love it so - i thought a headband variation would be great too easy and quick to knit and leave it simple or bling it up with a big button if you like requires ~ dk yarn in 1 or 2 colours 4mm needles sizes ~ 0 - 3 months 3 - 6 months 6 - 9 months 9 - 12 months have fun **to get this free pattern please click on the https link just below ↓**
